wybug_title: 56网某分站后台弱口令导致可内网渗透(已证明写SHELL)
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-11-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-11-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-11-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-11-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-12-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-12-19：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 某分站后台弱口令，导致可SHELL并间接内网渗透。 详细说明：  {问题分站}网址 http://cp.corp.56.com 
存在弱口令:http://cp.corp.56.com/wp-login.php用户名：admin 密码:1q2w3e4r


   漏洞证明：  {SHELL证明}
[*] 基本信息 [ 	Linux mis.corp.56.com 2.6.23.9 #1 SMP Thu Dec 20 23:36:05 CST 2007 x86_64(nobody) ][/]$ /sbin/ifconfig -aeth0      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:16:17:E4:0E:8E            inet addr:113.106.26.192  Bcast:113.106.26.255  Mask:255.255.255.0          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1          RX packets:6273599639 errors:0 dropped:46 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:7023111937 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000           RX bytes:1151364914111 (1.0 TiB)  TX bytes:7652271878118 (6.9 TiB)          Interrupt:24 eth1      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:16:17:E4:0E:8F            inet addr:112.90.50.177  Bcast:112.90.50.191  Mask:255.255.255.192          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1          RX packets:82175678850 errors:15 dropped:7717 overruns:0 frame:14          TX packets:27277987129 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000           RX bytes:103769011426056 (94.3 TiB)  TX bytes:8980292983483 (8.1 TiB)          Interrupt:25 eth1:1    Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:16:17:E4:0E:8F            inet addr:172.16.26.192  Bcast:172.16.255.255  Mask:255.255.0.0          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1          Interrupt:25 eth1:2    Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:16:17:E4:0E:8F            inet addr:172.16.215.192  Bcast:172.16.255.255  Mask:255.255.0.0          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1          Interrupt:25 lo        Link encap:Local Loopback            inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0          UP LOOPBACK RUNNING  MTU:16436  Metric:1          RX packets:134442619 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:134442619 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:0           RX bytes:44911233435 (41.8 GiB)  TX bytes:44911233435 (41.8 GiB)[/]$

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2013-11-05 12:32 厂商回复： 谢谢反馈，已经处理。 最新状态： 暂无
